comments:

looks like using different versions of plugins. Is that possible?
jdt.core made changes in the ICodeCompletionRequestor API, but these were 
adapted by jdt.ui.
205 seems to works fine with code assist.
Ok to close?

Hmmm...now that I think about it there was a JDTCore patch that I may have 
installed. This PR can be closed and if I see the behaviour again I will re-
open.
